abstract_summ: The results showed that (1) at both prefecture and county levels, the global spatial autocorrelation was extremely significant for the cumulative confirmed COVID-19 cases (CCC) in Hubei province from 30 January to 18 February 2020.Conclusions: The priority cities for COVID-19 prevention and control in Henan province should pay special attention to the cities that have exceeded the expected number of COVID-19 cases, and the implementation of high-level control measures can effectively control the spread of COVID-19 within 2-4 weeks during the early stage of the epidemic.Methods: Linear regression analysis were used to establish a linear regression model with the number of Wuhan roaming people as the dependent variable and the cumulative number of COVID-19 cases in Henan province as the dependent variable, and to calculate and plot the regional distribution of the number of cases in 18 cities in Henan province in accordance with the criteria of whether the number of cases exceeded the expected number.CONCLUSIONS: Spatial analysis is of great help in understanding the spread of infectious diseases, and spatial association was the key to the spatial spread during the early stages of the COVID-19 pandemic in mainland China.Hence, local outlier analysis and emerging spatiotemporal hot spot analysis were performed to analyze the spatiotemporal clustering pattern and cold\hot spot trends of COVID-19 cases based on space-time cube during the period from January 23, 2020 to February 24, 2020.
title_summ: Visualizing the distribution of COVID-19 in Chinese MainlandSpatiotemporal pattern of COVID-19 and government response in South Korea (as of May 31, 2020)Spatial epidemic dynamics of the COVID-19 outbreak in ChinaSpatial Statistics and Influencing Factors of the COVID-19 Epidemic at Both Prefecture and County Levels in Hubei Province, ChinaCorrelation between travellers departing from Wuhan before the Spring Festival and subsequent spread of COVID-19 to all provinces in ChinaThe changing patter of COVID-19 in China: A tempo-geographic analysis of the SARS-CoV-2 epidemicSpatio-Temporal Patterns of the 2019-nCoV Epidemic at the County Level in Hubei Province, ChinaLinear regression analysis of COVID-19 outbreak and control in Henan province caused by the output population from WuhanResearch on the Influence of Effective Distance Between Cities on the Cross-regional Transmission of COVID-19Is the epidemic spread related to GDP?An Analysis of Spatiotemporal Pattern for COIVD-19 in China based on Space-Time Cube.Spatial-temporal characteristics of AIDS incidences in Mainland China.
